p: Diallyl acrylpimarate is a yellow liquid [ 123]. It can be prepared from acrylpimaric acid and an allyl halide by different methods, according to Scheme 17, and using separation methods such as filtration, washing, extraction and evaporation [ 88, 123, 177]. It can be applied as a monomer in polyester unsaturated resins from renewable resources [ 123], or in synthesis of aminated curing agent for epoxy [ 178].
